website_summaries.verdict: Very easy on your budget, but it lacks in comfort and space – good for cruising, but not the best choice for lounging or fishing on the water.
pros: Features bright colors and attractive design
Can be used on lakes, yet is small enough for use in some pools
cons: Comes with oars but they aren't very sturdy
Not a lot of space once people get aboard
Challenging to maneuver, and not for use in rough currents

customer_reviews.title: good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the Intex 300, which leaked right away and had to be returned. This is much better and not as expensive either. Just a little air seepage out of the main valve, but nothing dangerous or deal-breaking. These things are never perfect, but so far it is holding up great and we are having a fun time in the lake with it.
customer_reviews.author: Antares

customer_reviews.title: 3 people, no way
customer_reviews.text: It was big and fun. you'll need oars and a rope to pull it. I wouldn't trust this in the ocean. I barely trusted it in a small lake, but it was a lot of fun this summer and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: I think it had a pinhole leak
customer_reviews.text: I pumped it up straight out of the box and within about 30 minutes is was very flat to the point where I didn't feel confident taking it across the lake like I intended. It may have just been temperature difference making it not as pressurized but I think it had a pinhole leak. Also doesn't come with oars like I expected. But to be fair it doesn't say it does. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yosemite Rapids No Problem
customer_reviews.text: Charged some light rapids in Yosemite in this thing! SEND IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 adults can fit in this comfortably. We have 4 kids and they love this.
customer_reviews.author: Maiko

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat For The Bucks
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy boat that comfortably fits two. Thick rubber shell can take some abuse. Does NOT come with oars (thus only 4 stars) but otherwise an excellent value for your money... better priced than what look to be inferior, smaller competitor rafts. In this inexpensive price range, likely the best deal going.
customer_reviews.author: rick s.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a week long vacation to play in the river. We were pretty rough on it - adults and kids alike rafting through light rapids and over rocks. It would lose a little bit of air overnight, but nothing major. Overall it held up great and was well worth the money. If I can get two summers out of it, I call that a win.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew R Thomas

customer_reviews.title: its awsome i blew it up and tryed it out pretty sturdy little raft
customer_reviews.text: got it in today!!! its awsome i blew it up and tryed it out pretty sturdy little raft, i love it:)
customer_reviews.author: john henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this item. It is in perfect condition and is easy to handle. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: cheryl richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not as safe for lakes as it claims!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this little boat until the oar kept untwisting while we were in the lake! We got stuck in the middle of the lake and we couldn’t row against the tides, the oars are super cheap. This little boat would be great in a pool, but I don’t recommend going into a lake with it. We had to call for help to get pulled in by kayakers!
customer_reviews.author: Iyana Maclin

customer_reviews.title: It is not as sturdy as a real raft
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3 person raft. I am a very tall girl, so it was roomy enough for me and one other person. It is not as sturdy as a real raft, so rowing was difficult. Also, it can be easy to lose the oars as there is no catch to keep them there. It is better as a flotation device in a lake with no current, or in a pool. Because it is so wide, and the bottom is not flat and sturdy, you can get swept out by a current, and you will have difficulty rowing back into shore. Definitely not for unsupervised children.
customer_reviews.author: portia mitchell
